  1 <?php
  2 
  3 App::uses('CrudAction', 'Crud.Controller/Crud');
  4 
  5 /**
  6  * Handles 'Index' Crud actions
  7  *
  8  * Licensed under The MIT License
  9  * For full copyright and license information, please see the LICENSE.txt
 10  */
 11 class IndexCrudAction extends CrudAction {
 12 
 13 /**
 14  * Default settings for 'index' actions
 15  *
 16  * `enabled` Is this crud action enabled or disabled
 17  *
 18  * `findMethod` The default `Model::find()` method for reading data
 19  *
 20  * `view` A map of the controller action and the view to render
 21  * If `NULL` (the default) the controller action name will be used
 22  *
 23  * @var array
 24  */
 25     protected $_settings = array(
 26         'enabled' => true,
 27         'findMethod' => 'all',
 28         'view' => null,
 29         'viewVar' => null,
 30         'serialize' => array(),
 31         'api' => array(
 32             'success' => array(
 33                 'code' => 200
 34             ),
 35             'error' => array(
 36                 'code' => 400
 37             )
 38         )
 39     );
 40 
 41 /**
 42  * Constant representing the scope of this action
 43  *
 44  * @var integer
 45  */
 46     const ACTION_SCOPE = CrudAction::SCOPE_MODEL;
 47 
 48 /**
 49  * Change the name of the view variable name
 50  * of the data when its sent to the view
 51  *
 52  * @param mixed $method
 53  * @return mixed
 54  */
 55     public function viewVar($name = null) {
 56         if (empty($name)) {
 57             return $this->config('viewVar') ?: Inflector::variable($this->_controller()->name);
 58         }
 59 
 60         return $this->config('viewVar', $name);
 61     }
 62 
 63 /**
 64  * Compute pagination settings
 65  *
 66  * Initializes PaginatorComponent if it isn't loaded already
 67  * Modified the findType based on the CrudAction configuration
 68  *
 69  * @return array The Paginator settings
 70  */
 71     public function paginationConfig() {
 72         $controller = $this->_controller();
 73 
 74         if (!isset($controller->Paginator)) {
 75             $pagination = isset($controller->paginate) ? $controller->paginate : array();
 76             $controller->Paginator = $controller->Components->load('Paginator', $pagination);
 77         }
 78 
 79         $Paginator = $controller->Paginator;
 80         $settings = &$Paginator->settings;
 81 
 82         if (isset($settings[$controller->modelClass])) {
 83             if (empty($settings[$controller->modelClass]['findType'])) {
 84                 $settings[$controller->modelClass]['findType'] = $this->_getFindMethod('all');
 85             }
 86         } elseif (empty($settings['findType'])) {
 87             $settings['findType'] = $this->_getFindMethod('all');
 88         }
 89 
 90         return $settings;
 91     }
 92 
 93 /**
 94  * HTTP GET handler
 95  *
 96  * @return void
 97  */
 98     protected function _get() {
 99         $this->paginationConfig();
100 
101         $controller = $this->_controller();
102 
103         $success = true;
104         $viewVar = $this->viewVar();
105 
106         $subject = $this->_trigger('beforePaginate', array('paginator' => $controller->Paginator, 'success' => $success, 'viewVar' => $viewVar));
107         $items = $controller->paginate($this->_model());
108         $subject = $this->_trigger('afterPaginate', array('success' => $subject->success, 'viewVar' => $subject->viewVar, 'items' => $items));
109 
110         $items = $subject->items;
111 
112         if ($items instanceof Iterator) {
113             $items = iterator_to_array($items);
114         }
115 
116         $controller->set(array('success' => $subject->success, $subject->viewVar => $items));
117         $this->_trigger('beforeRender', $subject);
118     }
119 
120 }
